page.title: 13Leisure Activities.
page.content: {Arts & Crafts. Arts and crafts are very important as hobbies in the area, often centered on W.I., evening classes or cottage craft groups. They include pottery, patchwork, embroidery,macrame, hand and machine knitting. There is a commercial photographer centred on Belchamp Walter, and an expert repairer of ceramics in Belchamp Otten who often works for museums and antique dealers. {Recreation}Local recreations are country ones,the local hunt is the East Essex Hunt,riding and driving is a very popular pastime with a driving club based on Halstead. Shooting also popular with pheasants reared locally, clay pigeon shooting, cycle riding, ferreting. The most popular local recreation is gardening with keen competition to produce the big.or best
